changes.comment: Adds a new experiment `useIPCScriptsInWatchMode`. When this flag is enabled and Rush is running in watch mode, it will check for npm scripts named `_phase:<phase-name>:ipc`, and if found, use them instead of the normal invocation of `_phase:<phase-name>`. When doing so, it will provide an IPC channel to the child process and expect the child to outlive the current build pass.
